Package pkgMain

Class InvScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.InvScreen
public class InvScreen
extends java.lang.Object
Inventory Screen class. Handles formatting of Inventory Screen. Adds three demo plants
Author:
Aidan Chao, Nicholas Cutrona, Caleb Davis, Joey Loporto, Tommy Cheung

    • createScreen

      public void createScreen​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Plant> plantData, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image> imageData)
      Sets up the InvScreen. Creates and formats the labels HBox. adds plants from plantData, sets conditions accordingly.
      Parameters:
      plantData - HashMap-String, Plant- plantData to be shown on screen
      imageData - HashMap-String, Image- images for plants
